titleStmt.title: A justification of set forms of prayer and in special of the liturgy of the Church of England; in answer to, and confutation of Vavasor Powel's Fourteen considerations, against all composed and imposed forms of prayer. By Richard Lewthwat, M.A. and rector of Wethersdale in Suffolk.
titleStmt.author: Lewthwat, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. Godbid and J. Playford, for Robert Clavel, at the Peacock in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
